title: Giro d’Italia Stage 3: Merlier Strikes First in Sprinter Showdown After Pogačar Springs Late Attack
content:
Pogačar nearly steals the show from the sprinters with wild late attack that was only reeled in within sight of the line.

Read the full article at Giro d’Italia Stage 3: Merlier Strikes First in Sprinter Showdown After Pogačar Springs Late Attack on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
